item.title: Web crawler on simple Chinese web
item.description: We will use the R-package:“rvest” for web crawler this time. The example web html: https://heavenlyfood.cn/books/menu.php?id=2021 (国度的操练为着教会的建造) This web is written by simple Chinese. So we will trans the language to Traditional Chinese. We will use the R-pac
